content: rs work 9 sts in pattern put them 10 row in k2 p2 rib starting with k2 on hold bind off 14 sts work remaining 9 sts in patt put them on hold break yarn change to us 6 needles and work 28 row in stockinette stitch switch back to us 4 needles and divide for front front and back as follows re-attach yarn to begin a ws row rs bind off 2 stitches * k2 p2 k2 6 times ws row p3 k2 p2 6 times k2 p3 p2 k3* these 32 stitches will be the front bind off 2 more stitches and then repeat from * rs row k3 p2 k2 6 times p2 k3 these 32 stitches will be the back knit the last work a total of 14 row from armhole ending 2 stitches with a ws row next row ws bind off 2 stitches p2 k2 7 next row rs work 9 stitches in pattern for times p3 left shoulder strap bind off 14 sts work continue working to and fro the stitches of the remaining 9 sts in pattern for right shoulder back for 20 row strap finish the back and work the front as given in continue working only the right shoulder the original pattern strap until you have completed 15 row from neckline break yarn and put stitches on hold sew the side seam using mattress stitch re-attach yarn to work a ws row of the left shoulder strap when you have completed 15 thank you mary row from neckline break yarn and put stitches on hold © 2011 - joji locatelli for personal use only please do not sell or distribute 2 hhhhaaaatttt you can find a great tutorial on how to make them here using us 4 needles cast on 68 sts and join for http //techknitting blogspot com/2008/05/ho working in the round place marker w-to-make-pom-poms html work 26 rounds in k2p2 ribbing the one shown in the sample is 1 ½ 4 cm wide crown round 1 k2 k2tog repeat to end of round 51 sts remain round 2 k2tog k to end of round 50 sts remain round 3 k3 k2tog repeat to end of round 40 sts remain round 4 k to end of round round 5 k2 k2tog repeat to end of round 30 sts remain round 6 k1 k 2 decrease repeat to end of round 20 sts remain round 7 k2tog to end of round cut yarn leaving a 20 inches tail thread it onto a tapestry needle and weave it through remaining 10 stitches to close hole gift with love and pride… finishing for comments or questions regarding this weave in ends pattern please contact me at block lightly jojilocat@fibertel com ar you can also find me in ravelry as jojilocat make a pom-pom and sew it to the top of the hat © 2011 -
